source.header: Where did you find the material?
source.intro: A link or URL to the page is really helpful. If you don't have one, the name of the company or website is fine.

more-info.header: Can you tell us more about the material?
more-info.intro: So we can find it, please provide any information you think is helpful. You can provide a screenshot or photo on the next page.

image.header: Do you want to add a photo or screenshot?
